snippet: Hamilton E. James Jr., the president of Blackstone and one of the few prominent Democratic supporters from the private equity world, will host a fund-raiser for President Obama in mid-May, Nicholas Confessore reports for The New York Times Caucus...
abstract: Hamilton E. James Jr., the president of Blackstone and one of the few prominent Democratic supporters from the private equity world, will host a fund-raiser for President Obama in mid-May, Nicholas Confessore reports for The New York Times Caucus blog.

headline.main: A Rare Private Equity Chieftain in Obama's Camp
